title: Spore.Installer.Fix-dGE-REUPLOAD
description:
REUPLOAD: As requested, I zipped the folder and just in case, zipped the .app itself too. Here you go :)



<= Spore Installer OSX 10.4.11 Fix dGE REUPLOAD =>

Tested on 1,66ghz Mac Mini
running OSX 10.4.11, using Intel GMA 950

NOTE: Only tested on my Mac Mini, don&#039;t come back to whine it isn&#039;t working!

Installation:

1. Run Installerfixed.app from anywhere you like with Spore CD in the cd-tray.
2. If you run 10.4.11, replace Spore.app info.plist with the one in the torrent. Put it in Spore.app -> Contents -> Info.plist. Make sure you replace the previous one.
3. Double click Spore.app and enjoy!

<= dGE =>
